Parameters.Name: SEARCH-6-1-10 FIND PTZ POSITION – FORWARD AND BACKWARD SEARCH (SEARCH ENDPOINTS INSIDE RECORDING ENDPOINTS)

Test.TestName: Search: check of GetRecordingInformation in Compact Mode
Test.Name: #1204 Log for check of Search test cases (GetRecordingInformation)
Test.Description: To check that DTT uses Recording token from setting file in Search test cases for GetRecordingInformation command

Test.TestName: Search: check of SearchTimeout in Compact Mode
Test.Name: #1204 Log for check of Search test cases (SearchTimeout)
Test.Description: To check that DTT uses SearchTimeout from setting file in Search test cases

Test.Name: To check that DTT uses EP address from feature definition
Test.Description: 1. Use simulator that answers to probe (http://192.168.10.192:8090/) 2. Check IPCONFIG-1-1-1 IPV4 STATIC IP test case in log 3. Test shall be failed on STEP 7 - Waiting for Hello message from the DUT 4. In step with Hello check that Endpoint Address = address of simulator (urn:uuid:00075f74-9d25-259d-745f-0700075f745f)
